    • Method Detail

      • CreateCards

        public void CreateCards(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> provinces,
               int nbrOfJokers)
        Constructs the cards in the deck given an array containing the names of all provinces in the game and the number of jokers there should be in the deck.
        Parameters:
        provinces - array with the names of all provinces.
        nbrOfJokers - number of jokers in the deck.

      • giveCard

        public static ICard giveCard()
        Method for dealing a card.
        Returns:
        the top card in the deck.

      • discard

        public static void discard(ICard card)
        Method which adds the given card to the list of discarded cards.
        Parameters:
        card - the card being discarded.

      • recycleCards

        public static void recycleCards()
        Method for shuffling and moving the discarded cards into the deck. If deck is not empty methods adds shuffled cards to the end of the deck list.
